item.description:
Holiday Open House

The Bostonian Society invites everyone interested in the history of Boston to a festive evening at the Old State House.

Wednesday, December 15, 2010, 6:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.

: : :


This year, their popular annual event features:


  • The launch of Mapping Revolutionary Boston, the newest feature of their website;
  • The unveiling of two newly-conserved paintings, sponsored by Society Member Robert Severy;
  • Live music by Poor Richard's Penny: 18th - century music and participatory dancing for all!;
  • Short gallery talks by their Education Associates;
  • Special holiday offers in their museum shop;
  • Refreshments provided by The Catered Affair;


This event is free and open to the public.
item.name: The Bostonian Society
